title: Counting polarizations on abelian varieties with group action
authors: Robert Auffarth, Angel Carocca, Rub\'i E. Rodr\'iguez
abstract:
Let $\mathcal{A}_g$ be the moduli space of principally polarized abelian
varieties. We study the problem of counting the number of principal
polarizations modulo the natural action of the automorphism group of the
abelian variety on a very general element of a positive dimensional component
of $\mathrm{Sing}(\mathcal{A}_g)$, and show that this number is not always 1.
